summary: Halfling NPC clothing I made for "the shire" Project.
descriptionHtml:
Latest Update: Added .esp for those without CK. Clothing is obtainable via console. Look for "Halfling Clothes" and "Halfling Clothes with Jacket". Requires the resource.

! THIS IS A RESOURCE !

This is some halfling NPC clothing I made as a personal request for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/7186659/?]TheBawb[/url] for his "the shire" project.
You can read about the project itself [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2203144-introducing-the-shire-a-skyrim-mod/]here[/url].

The clothing is for male and female. The male version comes with an optional jacket. The jacket as well as the male arms use slot 58. You can change that in the skin partition.

The texture size is 2048x2048.

Feel free to use this resource for your own mods.
author: kelretu
